Code Documentation

rcm_layer.rcm Module

rcm.py: Contains a Keras layer implementation of the Recurrent Complete Multidigraph Layer

class rcm_layer.rcm.ActivationTable[source]

Bases: TypedDict

Defines the Activation Table dictionary used by the RCM layer

hidden: str
inputs: str
outputs: str
class rcm_layer.rcm.RCM(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Layer

A Keras implementation of the Recurrent Complete Multidigraph Layer

build(input_shape)[source]

Creates weights, biases, and untracked node states

call(inputs, *args, **kwargs)[source]

Performs a self-recurrent forward propagation. Using the @tf.function decorator allows it to be ran as a graph, greatly accelerating training speed.

get_config()[source]

Allows for serialization

rcm_layer.visualizations Module

visualizations.py: Contains methods for creating a visualization

rcm_layer.visualizations.plot_and_save_logo(save_path: str)[source]

Generates the RCM logo

rcm_layer.visualizations.plot_from_weights(weights: ndarray, input_units: int, hidden_units: int)[source]

Creates a plot of the RCM layer given an array of weights

Creates plot of Recurrent Complete Multidigraph model
